message: We have actually played with this idea - we briefly implemented it, but it blocked the upload for a quite a while (5 seconds or so) in order to send the request once the upload had finished - is that a reasonable tradeoff for your use cases?

So far, I am incredibly happy with ep.io, except for one thing. When I upload a new version of my app and open it in the browser, I have to wait for the instance to spin up. Would it be possible to go ahead and load the dynamic instance as soon as a new upload is received? Most of the time you're just going to open it up anyways, and this would make the development experience a lot more seamless.
Maybe. Could you do it asynchronously, after the upload finishes?
